00024 #ifndef PVector_h
00025 #define PVector_h
00026 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 #include "easylink.h"
00028 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class PVector
00034 {
00035 
00036 protected:
00038     int_T D;
00040     void **T;
00042     bool Shared;
00043 
00044 public:
00045     
00046     // Constructors and affiliated methods ----------------------------------
00047 
00051     inline PVector(int_T dim);
00052 
00057     inline PVector(int_T dim,void **t);
00058 
00061     inline PVector(const PVector &V);
00062 
00065     inline PVector(void);
00066 
00071     inline void SetPVector(int_T dim);
00072 
00073     // Destructor and affiliated methods ------------------------------------
00074 
00077     inline ~PVector(void);
00078 
00080     inline void Empty(void);
00081 
00082     // Sharing methods ------------------------------------------------------
00083 
00086     inline void ShareArray(PVector & V);
00087 
00088     // Operator = and initialization methods -------------------------------
00089 
00093     inline void operator=(const PVector &V);
00094 
00095     // Read/write methods -------------------------------------------------------
00096 
00098     inline void* & operator[](int_T i);
00099 
00100     // Size methods ------------------------------------------------
00101 
00103     inline int_T Size(void);
00104 
00106     inline int_T Length(void);
00107     
00108 };
00109 
00110 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 inline PVector::PVector(int_T dim)
00114 {
00115     D=dim;
00116     T=new void*[D];//T contains the adress of the first component table which is a pointer void*
00117     Shared=false;
00118 }
00119 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 inline PVector::PVector(int_T dim,void **t)
00121 {
00122     D=dim;
00123     T=t;
00124     Shared=true;
00125 }
00126 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 inline PVector::PVector(const PVector &V)
00128 {
00129     D=V.D;
00130     T=new void*[D];
00131     
00132     memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(void*) );
00133 
00134     Shared=false;
00135 }
00136 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 inline PVector::PVector(void)
00138 {
00139     D=0;
00140     T=NULL;
00141     Shared=false;
00142 }
00143 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 inline PVector::~PVector(void)
00145 {
00146     Empty();
00147 }
00148 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 inline void PVector::Empty(void)
00150 {
00151     if (D!=0)
00152     {
00153         if (!Shared)
00154             delete [] T;
00155         T=NULL;
00156         D=0;
00157         Shared=false;
00158     }
00159 }
00160 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 inline void PVector::ShareArray(PVector & V)
00162 {
00163     Empty();
00164     Shared=true;
00165     D=V.D;
00166     T=V.T;
00167 }
00168 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 inline void PVector::SetPVector(int_T dim)
00170 {
00171     Empty();
00172     D=dim;
00173     T=new void*[D];
00174 }
00175 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 inline void PVector::operator=(const PVector &V)
00177 {
00178     if (D==V.D)
00179         memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(void*) );
00180     else
00181     {
00182         if (!Shared)
00183         {
00184             Empty();
00185             D=V.D;
00186             T=new void*[D];
00187             memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(void*) );
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191             sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to affect a %i pvector to a %i pvector.\n",V.D,D);
00192             mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00193         }
00194      }
00195 }
00196 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 inline void* & PVector::operator[](int_T i)
00198 {
00199     if ((i<0)||(i>=D))
00200     {
00201         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: PVector index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i.\n",i,D-1);
00202         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00203         //return PVectorErrorValue;
00204     }
00205     return(T[i]);
00206 }
00207 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 inline int_T PVector::Size(void)
00209 {
00210     return(D);
00211 }
00212 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00213 inline int_T PVector::Length(void)
00214 {
00215     return(D);
00216 }
00217 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 #endif
